articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Training of KPA Air Force Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Training of KPA Air Force Unit 378b
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, state and army of the DPRK, guided a flight training of KPA Air Force Unit 378 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					After receiving a salute, he acquainted himself with the unit's performance of guard duty and guided the flight training of pilots.
					
					Watching the bold and dynamic performance by pilots, he, his face beaming with a broad smile, praised them for their success in training.
					
					He congratulated all the pilots on their success in training, expressing great satisfaction with the fact that they have prepared themselves to be competent fighter pilots by undergoing dynamic flight training in a state of high alert, bearing deep in mind that training precisely means combat.
					
					No enemy dares intrude into Songun Korea, our country is standing high as an invulnerable bulwark and socialist fortress and the sky above it will always remain clear and blue as its territorial air is being defended by the dependable and proud pilots, he said.
					
					Then he went round a bedroom, mess hall and lecture rooms of the pilots of the sub-unit under the unit.
					
					The stars of the color badge the commanding officers are bearing are not a symbol of any treatment but an expression of trust in the responsibility they have assumed before the country and the revolution, he noted, saying that if they do not know the weight of the stars, they cannot claim they have qualifications as commanding officers.
					
					He called upon the commanding officers to think of the party's particular trust reflected in the stars even when they face difficulties in rounding off their combat preparations and settling the issue of the soldiers' living and to run and run till the soles of their boots are worn out, not forgetting the trust.
					
					He gave the leading members and staff members of the Supreme Command accompanying him the tasks to be fulfilled to finish the combat preparations of the People's Army.
					
					He had a photo session with the service personnel of the unit. Then he took hands of the commanding officers of the unit and told them to conduct training better in good health.
					
					He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong and Pak Jae Gyong and staff members of the KPA Supreme Command.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Demonstration by Players of Western Area Aviation Club
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts Lee Myung Bak's New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, in a "special new year address on state policy", blustered if the north takes "a sincere attitude," the south can carve out a new "era of the Korean Peninsula" together with it, asserting "a big change in the situation of the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia is expected" and vociferating about "a window of opportunity." 
					 He cried out for "making a strong counterattack in case of provocation", trumpeting about "a firm security posture".
					
					 He, at the same time, talked nonsense that if the north stops its nuclear related activities, the south can get rid of the "security concern" of the north through the six-party talks and provide aid necessary for "reviving" its economy.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea said in its Information Bulletin No. 989 Thursday:
					
					 What he uttered is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up the heinous crimes he committed against ethics and the nation during its mourning over the great loss and another hideous provocation, an indication of his invariable sinister intention to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 If a change is to be expected in the peninsula, it is only a total ruin of the Lee group which is as good as the living dead.
					
					 "Sincerity" and "peace and stability" touted by Lee is also no more than sophism intended to evade the blame for bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and driving the situation to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 "Possible provocation" by someone and "strong counteraction" touted by Lee are nothing but a hysteric fit caused by the firm resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to mete out a thousand-fold punishment for his thrice-cursed crimes.
					
					 Unpardonable is his talk about "stop to nuclear activities" and "aid".
					
					 As recognized by the world, the DPRK is a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and its nuclear deterrent is the revolutionary heritage which can never be bartered for anything.
					
					 The Lee group is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can have a bargaining over this precious revolutionary heritage with the promise of any "aid".
					
					 As long as the enemy is persistent in his moves for aggression, the DPRK will further reinforce the position of the nuclear weapons state to protect its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					  The remarks made by Lee in a "New Year address" that south Korea keeps "the window of opportunity" open are nothing but a shameless jargon.
					
					  The balderdash about "window of opportunity" and the like let loose again by the group of traitors only brought into bolder relief its shameless nature as it is no more than a mockery of the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 What awaits the Lee Myung Bak group at present is only a stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: Congratulations to Uzbek FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Uzbek FM
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Abdulaziz Kamilov upon his appointment as foreign minister of Uzbekistan.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the idea of independence, friendship and peace, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Situation in DPRK Is Peaceful as It Was: Russian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Situation in DPRK Is Peaceful as It Was: Russian Foreign Minister
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Moscow did not see any sign that the situation on the DPRK is likely to develop in the direction of instability, said Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov, when interviewed by Kyodo News on Thursday. 
					He continued:
					
					According to the information we have received, the situation on the DPRK is peaceful as it was before.
					
					After its mourning period, the life in the DPRK has gradually returned to normal.
					
					It is our view that the announcement of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army showed a smooth transition of power.
					
					Therefore, there is no sign that the situation in the DPRK is likely to develop in the direction of instability.
					
					As a close neighbor, Russia is interested in maintaining and developing political and economic relations with the DPRK.
					
					This was mentioned in the condolence message sent by President Medvedev, in particular, over the passing of Kim Jong Il.
					
					As far as the settlement of the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula is concerned, we are sure that there is no other alternative but to find a political and diplomatic solution to the issue within the framework of the six-party talks.
					
					Russia and other parties to the talks are seeking a reasonable way for restarting the talks.
					
					What is important, I think, is for all parties to be most prudent and exercise maximum restraint in their actions on the Peninsula and in its vicinity so that the tension is not escalated again. 
					
					Lavrov's remarks amount to Russia's total denial of the misinformation about "the instability of the system" in the DPRK, etc. spread by hostile forces.

articles.title: DPRK Makes Good Start of New Year in Economic Sectors
articles.content:
DPRK Makes Good Start of New Year in Economic Sectors
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have made great achievements in economic sectors from the beginning of the year.
					The Pyongyang and Pukchang thermal power complexes have increased daily electricity production 1.5 times that in the same days of last year.
					
					The Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex fulfilled its assignments at 106 percent in the first twenty days of the year. The Tokchon and Tukjang area coal mining complexes have also boosted production to fully supply coal to thermal power plants. 
					
					The Chongjin Steel Plant has already topped its monthly plan for the production of steel with locally available fuel and the Musan Mining Complex and the Unryul Mine raised the iron ore production.
					
					The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Hamhung Knitted Goods Factory, the Manpho Spinning Mill and other light industry factories are keeping themselves at full-capacity operation.
					
					Cooperative farms across the country have fully transported compost to fields.
					
					The housing construction in the Mansudae area and other major construction projects are making good headway.
					
					Meanwhile, artistes of national and provincial art troupes are visiting industrial establishments and construction sites for agitation for increased production and faster construction.

articles.title: Reception Given for Korean Schoolchildren's Art Troupe in Japan
articles.content:
Reception Given for Korean Schoolchildren's Art Troupe in Japan
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture Friday for the Korean schoolchildren's art troupe in Japan which took part in schoolchildren's New Year's Day performance. It was arranged under the care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					Present there on invitation were the art troupe headed by Yun Thae Gil, deputy principal of Korean Middle and High School in Tokyo, and compatriots in Japan.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, spoke at the reception.
					
					He recalled that Kim Jong Un made sure that the Korean schoolchildren's art troupe in Japan took part in the New Year Day's performance and showed great loving care for it just as leader Kim Jong Il did.
					
					He expressed belief that the Korean schoolchildren in Japan would firmly prepare as reliable successors to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) by keeping pace with Kim Jong Un.   
					
					Song Kun Hak, vice department director of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, spoke next.
					
					He extended deepest thanks to Kim Jong Un for inviting them to take part in the performance and showing warm love for them.
					
					While staying in the homeland, they realized the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man born of Heaven and witnessed its stirring reality, he noted. 
					
					He stressed all this helped deepen their faith that the revolutionary cause of Juche and patriotic cause of Chongryon are sure to win. 
					
					A joint performance was given by schoolchildren in Pyongyang and members of the art troupe from Japan.

articles.title: Reminiscences Showing Kim Il Sung's Personality off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
Reminiscences Showing Kim Il Sung's Personality off Press in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Vol. 99 of "Among the People", a book of reminiscences, has been brought out in the DPRK. 
					Contained in this volume are 25 reminiscences telling about the personality of President Kim Il Sung as a great man.
					
					Among them are "Valuable Instructions on Korean-style Combat Method", "Always Showing Deep Care for Pilots' Life" and "Tankman's Uniform Associated with Meticulous Love" dealing with the wise guidance and warm love of the President who led the People's Army to acquire the combat methods appropriate for geographical conditions of Korea and took meticulous care of servicepersons' living.
					
					Reminiscences "To Provide People with Better Conditions for Their Cultural Life" tell about the feats of the President who wisely guided the construction of Hamhung City to provide the citizens with better living conditions.
					
					They also include reminiscences elaborating on the fact that he led the drive to learn from the pure spiritual world of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, remembering them with deep emotion, and on his noble outlook on posterity. 
					
					Reminiscences "His Deep Solicitude Going beyond Oceans and Continents" tell about the fact that he gave lucid answers to questions raised by the president of an African country and showed warm benevolence for him.

articles.title: Best Athletes for 2011 Selected in DPRK
articles.content:
Best Athletes for 2011 Selected in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Ten best players and ten best coaches for Juche 100 (2011) were selected in the DPRK.
					The players were Yun Jin Il (male figure skater), Kim Un Guk (male weightlifter), Jo Yun Mi (female footballer), Jong Chun Mi (female weightlifter), Pak Nam Chol (male footballer), Kim Un Ju (female weightlifter), Yang Kyong Il (male wrestler), Yang Chun Song (male wrestler), O Jong Ae (female weightlifter) and Jo Yong Suk (female shooter).
					
					They scored good results in world, Asian or national championships last year.
					
					The ten coaches include Pak Chang Il, Pak Ki Song and Sin Ui Gun.

articles.title: Method of Raising Catfish Upgraded in Korea
articles.content:
Method of Raising Catfish Upgraded in Korea
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Catfish Farm has increased the rate of breeding a new variety of catfish (heclrobranchas, bidosalis.) 
					The breeding method employed by the farm is so effective that other fish farms are greatly interested in it. 
					
					Jang Yong Gwan, chief engineer of the Pyongyang Catfish Farm, told KCNA:
					
					"The weight of the new variety averages 3.5kg. We had some limitations in catfish production before. So, we have employed a new method of giving physiological irritation to catfish and improved the incubation technology. 
					
					We have also increased fish spawning and fertilizing rate with use of pituitary. Now the catfish production is 1.5 times higher than before the introduction of the new method." 
					
					The Pyongyang Catfish Farm is one of the country's major fish farms.

articles.title: Kumkop-trademarked Drinks
articles.content:
Kumkop-trademarked Drinks
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Kumkop-trademarked drinks have become popular among local sportspersons.
					Vice-secretary of the Weightlifting Association Jon Chol Ho told KCNA:
					
					"The drinks produced by the Kumkop Combined Foodstuff Factory for Sportspersons are favored by athletes, particularly weightlifters, footballers and marathoners, for their good flavor and nutritive qualities.
					
					It is very important for athletes to get back water in time after training. The drinks help them recover from fatigue in a relatively short time."
					
					A section chief of the factory, O Hyang Rim, said, "Our factory is associated with leader Kim Jong Il's deep concern for the country's sports development. We will provide athletes with highly nutritive drinks and help them register good results in international tournaments." 
					
					The factory, which began operation in October Juche 100 (2011), also turns out rice cakes, bread, cookies and processed meat.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses KBS of Abandoning Basic Mission of Media
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses KBS of Abandoning Basic Mission of Media
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- KBS is malignantly slinging mud at the DPRK every day, thus playing the role as a shock brigade of the Lee Myung Bak group keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					On Jan. 25 KBS aired another sheer lie that the DPRK "decided to punish illegal border trespass or use of hand phones during the mourning period as wartime crimes." It unhesitatingly used again such trite method of false propaganda as quoting any "source."
					
					It is known to have played the worst role in the anti-DPRK false propaganda, letting loose invectives about every matter after the big loss to the nation. Therefore, nobody would believe KBS accidentally echoed the above-said misinformation. 
					
					It is long since KBS was reduced to a pseudo broadcasting service for those in power after ceasing to be a medium whose life and soul are objectivity and fairness.
					
					KBS is a group of despicable servants and hack media persons who depend on the group of traitors to eke out their living after throwing away the soul and basic principle of media.
					
					It has committed a lot of crimes against the nation since the group of traitors came to power, chilling the ardent desire of the fellow countrymen for reconciliation, unity and reunification. It has become more undisguised in its activities against the nation before and after the mourning period. 
					
					The service personnel and people of the DPRK solemnly warned KBS and other conservative media that they would deserve punishment. But KBS became more reckless in its smear campaign than any other media to the astonishment of people. 
					
					As a crow is never white for often washing, KBS seems to be very busy to pay the bill for its meal to the puppet authorities.
					
					KBS will have to pay a very high price for having blatantly challenged the DPRK by behaving as badly as the group of traitors in defiance of its repeated warnings.
					
					KBS will come to realize what does this warning mean.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il reliably defended President Kim Il Sung's exploits for the cause of national reunification and laid a solid foundation for its accomplishment. This is an immortal great feat for the times and the nation.
					DPRK major newspaper Rodong Sinmun Friday stresses this in a bylined article.
					
					Through his distinguished ideo-theoretical activities, Kim Jong Il made sure that the cause of national reunification pioneered by Kim Il Sung has been given steady continuity, the article says, and goes on:
					
					In his work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification", Kim Jong Il systematized the President's exploits for reunification in a comprehensive way.
					
					He formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, provided by the President, as the Three Charters for National Reunification which serve as the only programme to be consistently adhered to and applied in the Koreans' movement for reunification.
					
					One of his great feats for national reunification is that he added brilliance to the President's idea on reunification and leadership exploits for it along with the era of independent reunification. 
					
					He provided the historic Pyongyang meeting and summit talks between the north and the south of Korea, for the first time in the history of the national division, and gave birth to the joint declaration the core of which is national independence. 
					
					Thus, the cause of national reunification further developed without any frustration as the cause of Kim Il Sung who started and guided it. This is the great feat of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. and south Korean Authorities' Reckless Military Action
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Military Action
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities jointly signed "Guidelines for Strategic Planning" for the "U.S.-South Korea Joint Plan for Coping with Local War," a plan for "reacting against somebody's provocation of a local war," in Washington on Jan. 25. 
					Minju Joson Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					The plan is, in essence, a document for a war and a scenario for aggression aimed at stifling the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					"The provocation of a local war" touted by the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers is nothing but sophism intended to cover their despicable true colors and justify their moves to ignite another Korean war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					It is the U.S. strategy for dominating the world to hold military supremacy in the Asian-Pacific region and meet its strategic interests in the region.
					
					Now that the U.S. shifted the focus of its military strategy to the Asia-Pacific region, it regards the scenario for stifling the DPRK by forces of arms as one of the important military tasks to be carried out to implement its strategy for dominating the world without fail.
					
					The moves of the U.S. to start a new war have created an unpredictably dangerous situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					60 U.S. new type tanks "M1-A2 Abrams" have already arrived at Pusan Port to be ready to go into action and a series of agreements are being concluded between the U.S. and south Korea for rapid delivery of latest military hardware. 
					
					It was reported that "Ulji Freedom Guardian" joint military exercises would be staged from 2013 under a new "combined defence system." This fact goes to prove that the U.S. and south Korean military warmongers made the collective military actions against the DPRK an established fact and are stepping up the preparations for them.
					
					The DPRK values peace but will not pardon in the least anyone who dares provoke it.

articles.title: S. Korean Air Force Participates in Exercises for War of Aggression in U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Air Force Participates in Exercises for War of Aggression in U.S.
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet air force has taken part in the U.S.-led joint military exercises Red Flag which started on Jan. 22 in an air base in Nevada of the U.S.
					Involved in the exercises are not only the U.S. Air Force, Navy, Marines, air force of the defense forces of the state but also armed forces of its following forces.
					
					The south Korean warmongers sent F-15Ks belonging to the 11th Combat Flying Corps to those maneuvers. They are busy with a drill for mounting an attack on enemy positions and the exercise for air support operation by using laser-guided bombs and JDAM. 
					
					It is reported that the above-said saber-rattling will last till Feb. 4. 
					
					The south Korean warmongers were under fire by public at home and abroad for taking part in the similar exercises in 2008. 
					
					The war hysteria kicked up by the south Korean puppet forces in support of the U.S. imperialists' policy of aggression for world domination under the signboard of alliance is reaching a dangerous phase as the days go by.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Denounced by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Denounced by Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Jan. 23 posted on its homepage an article by Korean resident in the U.S. Kim Suk denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak for his sycophancy and treachery. 
					The article accused the Lee bellicose forces of planning to stage the largest-ever joint military exercises with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces for invading the DPRK. 
					
					It queried Lee for how long he is going to offer the south Korean army as mercenaries of outside forces after becoming a servant of the U.S. in helping realize its ambition for dominating Northeast Asia.
					
					Lee Myung Bak could neither scrap the north-south declarations nor work with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen unless the blood of the sworn enemies of the nation ran in his vein. 
					
					Lee Myung Bak is, indeed, a traitor. 
					
					He does not say "no" to whatever demanded by the U.S. 
					
					It is just south Korea and Lee Myung Bak that have become a laughing stock of the international community as they have failed to behave properly towards any issue. 
					
					He is pitiable, indeed. Everybody is saddened by the fact that Lee is "president" as he lacks confidence and knowledge. 
					
					Lee is not the only man of such type. 
					
					Brass hats of the south Korean army must feel shame as they blindly behave as dictated by the U.S. 
					
					If they have nothing to know, they would be well advised to imitate what the DPRK does as it has defended sovereignty from all the pressures of the imperialist forces while tightening its belt with strong gut and confidence. 
					
					It is the biggest evil in history that Lee Myung Bak became "president".

articles.title: Lunar New Year Gathering of Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Gathering of Koreans in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Old Persons' Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan arranged a lunar New Year gathering in Tashkent on Jan. 23.
					Attending the gathering were Chairman Ju Yong Il and Vice-Chairman Ko Tae Chun of the Association and Korean residents in Uzbekistan.
					
					Present on invitation were the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Tashkent.
					
					At the gathering Ju Yong Il declared that the Koreans in Uzbekistan would work harder for national reunification and prosperity, keeping step with the people in the homeland who have turned out to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Then, there was a performance of compatriot artistes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on Jan. 17 posted on its internet homepage a special write-up illustrated with the picture of leader Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering masses. 
					In the preface the homepage said that the Korean people bear deep in mind the belief that Kim Jong Il is always with them though it is almost one month since he passed away. 
					
					In an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will live forever" the homepage said:
					
					In the untimely passing of leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Il the world lost the most prominent leader. He was the greatest man, indeed. 
					
					Kim Jong Il was a great master of thought and theory. 
					
					He comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea and pioneer of the human cause of independence. 
					
					The homepage recalled that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a country which produced and launched satellites and had access to nuclear weapons with the might of Songun politics and started an industrial revolution in the new century. 
					
					It also pointed to the fact that he ushered in the June 15 era of reunification guided by the idea of "By the Korean nation itself" and gave a powerful impetus to global independence through his energetic external activities. 
					
					The homepage in another article titled "Bitter tears of the Korean people" said that the tears shed by the Korean people were not simple ones but the results of the single-minded unity of the DPRK society where the leader and people form a community linked by the same destiny and a manifestation of confidence and pledge of all people to be true to the idea and guidance of the leader to the last.

articles.title: Resolution to Expand Ranks of Juche Idea Followers Expressed by Nigerians
articles.content:
Resolution to Expand Ranks of Juche Idea Followers Expressed by Nigerians
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the annual meeting of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in Abuja on Jan. 18 evinced their pledge to register great successes in studying and disseminating the Juche idea this year so that the World Conference on the Juche Idea will be held with splendor and the ranks of the Juche idea followers be expanded.
					M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at the meeting that it was the greatest loss that leader Kim Jong Il, the benevolent teacher of the Juche idea followers, passed away last year.
					
					But we will not lose confidence as there is the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il in idea, personality and virtue, he added.

articles.title: Korean People Will Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem Forever: British Organizations
articles.content:
Korean People Will Hold Kim Jong Il in High Esteem Forever: British Organizations
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Jan. 15 in support of the special report of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The statement fully supported the decision of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, considering it as a reflection of the unanimous will and desire of the Korean people to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages.
					
					Very humble and thoughtful of only the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness before anything else, Kim Jong Il never allowed the erection of his statue in his lifetime, the statement said, and went on:
					
					To erect his statue is the unanimous desire of not only the Korean people but the world progressives and an issue which brooks no further delay.
					
					We will, together with the Korean people, significantly commemorate the Day of the Shining Star and pay highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who lies in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace.
					
					We the Juche idea and Songun idea followers will hold him in high esteem forever as the peerless Songun brilliant commander and defender of global independence.

articles.title: Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported by Democratic Congolese Party Leader
articles.content:
Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported by Democratic Congolese Party Leader
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo and its people will always support the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people and make sustained efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two peoples.
					Evariste Boshab, secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo, said this on Jan. 20 when he met with DPRK Ambassador to his country Ri Myong Chol.
					
					The passing of leader Kim Jong Il was a great loss to the Korean revolution and people, the secretary general said, and went on:
					
					We are convinced that the undying idea and cause of Kim Jong Il will be successfully carried forward.
					
					It is the fortune of the WPK and the Korean people to hold the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme leader of the party, state and army.
					
					We were deeply moved to watch TV showing Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Acts of Treachery
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Acts of Treachery
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Jan. 15 denouncing the south Korean authorities for having driven the inter-Korean relations into a total catastrophe.
					The statement expressed sympathy with the white paper released by the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea laying bare such crimes perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors last year as putting the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase.
					
					The group's accusations against the DPRK are an insult to the Korean people who suffered the great loss as they went beyond morality, ethics and discretion, it said, and went on:
					
					The group is spreading all kinds of invectives and lies about the DPRK through the West's reptile media. But its foolish and despicable misinformation has been proved to be a lie by the reality of the DPRK in which the leader and the people form a harmonious whole.
					
					The Korean people are rallied closer around their leader as shown by the mourning events on the passing of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It is a foolish dream to expect any change in the DPRK.
					
					If a change is needed in the Korean Peninsula, it is to throw overboard the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.

articles.title: China Plans to Launch 30 Satellites This Year
articles.content:
China Plans to Launch 30 Satellites This Year
Beijing, January 26 (KCNA) -- China has planned to launch 30 satellites this year, the Space Science and Technology Group Corporation of this country recently reported.

articles.title: Russia Rejects West's Another Sanctions on Iran
articles.content:
Russia Rejects West's Another Sanctions on Iran
Moscow, January 26 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry on Monday condemned the West's new sanctions on Iran.
					The ministry said that the sanctions are, in essence, an attempt to stifle the economy of Iran and an open pressure upon this country.
					
					The strengthened sanctions on Iran have nothing to deal with settlement of its nuclear issue and any pressure can never bring a solution to any issue, it stressed.
					
					It declared again the stand of Russia that the issues over Iran's nuclear program should be solved through political and diplomatic means, by way of dialogue respecting each other.

articles.title: Togolese President Asks African Countries to Develop Better Conflict Resolution Mechanisms
articles.content:
Togolese President Asks African Countries to Develop Better Conflict Resolution Mechanisms
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Togolese President Faure Gnassingbe Tuesday deplored the persistent tensions that have followed the Arab Spring in the Maghreb, noting that this should provoke a deeper reflection on the need to come up with better conflict resolution mechanisms on the African continent.
					The Togolese president called for closer cooperation between the African Union and the United Nations in their efforts to establish peace on the continent.

articles.title: Iran Denounces West's Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran Denounces West's Sanctions
Tehran, January 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for Iran's Foreign Ministry on Monday rejected the West's sanctions on Iran.
					The West on the same day decided to impose sanctions on Iran's oil exports field and freeze assets of its central bank. Such decision will come to failure as it was made under the political pressure of the U.S., he said.
					
					The sanctions will not block the advance of the Iranian people working to use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes, he said, adding that the West should not obey the demand of the U.S.

articles.title: India Calls for End to Israeli Settlement Activities
articles.content:
India Calls for End to Israeli Settlement Activities
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- India said Tuesday that Israel should completely stop settlement activities in the occupied Palestinian territories, saying that continuing settlement activities are undermining the efforts of the international community to resolve the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
					The statement came as Hardeep Singh Puri, Indian permanent representative to the United Nations, was taking the floor at the UN Security Council on the situation in the Middle East.
					
					"Settlement activities have also exacerbated the humanitarian problems of the Palestinian people in the West Bank and East Jerusalem," he said.

articles.title: Indonesia Strives to Modernize Its Weaponry
articles.content:
Indonesia Strives to Modernize Its Weaponry
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Indonesia is directing efforts to modernizing its weaponry.
					Its government has allocated about 14 trillion rupiah (some 1.54 billion U.S. dollars) to support the weaponry modernization plan for 2011 and 2012.
					
					Among the equipment to be bought are tanks, helicopters for combat and transport, anti-war plane equipment and others.

articles.title: ACNC comenta actividades venales de KBS
articles.content:
ACNC comenta actividades venales de KBS
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- La radiodifusion surcoreana KBS calumnia diariamente  a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cumpliendo asi el papal de agente de la banda de Lee Myung Bak enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida. 
					El pasado 25, KBS difundio la desinformacion de que "la RPDC decidio castigar como crimen de guerra el cruce ilegal de frontera y el uso de telefono portatil durante el gran duelo nacional". Y volvio a utilizar sin vacilacion el metodo rutinario so pretexto de citar las informaciones de la "fuente" de alguien. 
					
					Nadie cree que KBS, que siempre esta al frente de la campana de propaganda intrigante contra la RPDC divulgando maldiciones despues del gran duelo nacional, hubiera repetido por casualidad aquella noticia falsificada 
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, KBS dejo de hacerse el medio de prensa basado en la objetividad y la imparcialidad y se ha convertido en el seudo medio que adula al poder. 
					
					Pues, KBS es un grupo venal que abandono el espiritu y la mision fundamental de la prensa y mantiene la vida bajo el amparo de la banda traidora. 
					
					Despues de la toma del poder de la banda traidora surcoreana, cometio incontables crimenes congelando el fervor de la nacion aspirante a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la patria. Y antes y despues del gran duelo nacional, actuo con mas crueldad para vivir de parasito de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Los militares y habitantes coreanos advirtieron duramente que KBS y otros medios de prensa conservadores recibiran el castigo merecido. 
					
					Puesto que KBS se porta al igual que la banda traidora y desafia a la RPDC, dando espaldas a las reiteradas  advertencias de esta, pagara muy caro.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia maniobras militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia maniobras militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea firmaron el dia 25 en Washington la "guia del plan estrategico" para poner en accion el "plan de enfrentamiento conjunto a la provocacion local" so pretexto de "hacer frente a la provocacion local" de alguien.
					Este plan es, en su esencia, el documento de guerra y el plan agresivo para aplastar militarmente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea hablan de la "provocacion local" de alguien para ocultar sus malsanas naturalezas y justificar sus maquinaciones de provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					La estrategia de EE.UU. para dominar el mundo comprende lograr la heguemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico y garantizar en esta region sus intereses estrategicos.
					
					Una vez que el imperio traslado la prioridad de su  estrategia militar a la region de Asia-Pacifico, este toma el aplastamiento a Corea con las fuerzas armadas como una de las importantes tareas militares a ser resuelta sin falta en realizar su estrategia de dominio al mundo.
					
					Debido a las maniobras provocativas para la nueva guerra de EE.UU. se crea hoy en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion muy delicada.
					
					Los 60 tanques de nuevo tipo de marca norteamericana "M1-A2 Abrams"  llegaron ya en el puerto de Pusan y entraron en el estado de combate y EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea firman uno tras otro los acuerdos que posibilitan ofrecer rapidamente los equipos militares sofisticados.
					
					El hecho de que a partir del 2013, los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" se libraran a base de nuevo "sistema de defensa conjunta", muestra que los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos aceleran los preparativos para la accion militar colectiva contra la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC aprecia la paz, pero, no perdonara nunca a quien se atreve a tocarla.

articles.title: Coreana residente en EE.UU. condena a Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Coreana residente en EE.UU. condena a Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- La Asociacion Nacional de los Coreanos Residentes en Estados Unidos publico el dia 23 en su pagina web el articulo de Kim Suk, coreana residente en EE.UU., de denuncia a los actos vendepatrias serviles a grandes potencias del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					La nota refiere que las fuerzas belicistas de Lee intentan librar los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura contra el Norte de Corea en contubernio con las tropas agresivas norteamericanas.
					
					Critica que hasta cuando Lee Myung Bak sacrificaria al ejercito surcoreano como mercenarios de las fuerzas extranjeras como lacayo en realizar la ambicion hegemonica de su amo gringo en el Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Lee niega las declaraciones intercoreanas y recurre con frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida porque en su cuerpo circula la sangre de los enemigos jurados de la nacion coreana, denuncia la nota y prosigue:
					
					Lee Myung Bak es de veras el vendepatria, quien no niega ninguna demanda de EE.UU.
					
					El no actua dignamente, con lo cual el Sur de Corea y el mismo Lee son objetos de burla de la sociedad internacional.
					
					!Cuan pobre es el!
					
					Tambien los generales del ejercito surcoreano no sienten verguenza obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU.
					
					Deseo que estos aprendan a los connacionales del Norte de Corea, que defienden su soberania enfrentandose a toda clase de presion de las fuerzas imperialistas.
					
					La toma de presidencia por Lee resulta peor en la historia.

articles.title: Sigue siendo tranquila la situacion de Corea, afirma Lavrov
articles.content:
Sigue siendo tranquila la situacion de Corea, afirma Lavrov
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- En entrevista concedida el dia 26 a Kyodo, el canciller ruso Lavrov dijo que Moscu no ha captado ninguna senal de desarrollo inestable de la situacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun las informaciones que disponemos, la situacion de la RPDC sigue siendo tranquila y la vida en ella se vuelve a la normalidad despues de terminado el duelo nacional, senalo el ministro.
					
					Pensamos que la sucesion del poder no tuvo complicaciones al ser nombrado Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, apunto y agrego que no se ve ninguna senal de desarrollo inestable de la situacion en ese pais.
					
					Como pais vecino de la RPDC, Rusia esta interesada en mantener y desarrollar en el futuro tambien las relaciones politicas y economicas entre ambos paises, afirmo.
					
					Prosiguio que eso esta anotado tambien en el mensaje de condolencias del presidente ruso Medvedev enviado con motivo del deceso de       Kim Jong Il.
					
					Con respecto a la coordinacion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, estamos seguros de que no hay otra alternativa que resolverlo de manera politico-diplomatica en el marco de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, dijo.
					
					Rusia y otros participantes estan buscando el remedio racional para reactivar esa cita y es importante que todos los participantes actuen con maxima cautela para no regenerar las tensiones y se abstengan de sus acciones en la Peninsula Coreana  y su contorno.
					
					Estas palabras de Lavrov constituyen la negativa rotunda de Rusia a la demagogia de las fuerzas hostiles sobre la supuesta "inestabilidad del regimen" norcoreano.
